title: Discover LWOH Ohrid Airport in MSFS ‚úàÔ∏è: SoFly's Scenic Addon
description:
Welcome to LWOH Ohrid Airport in Microsoft Flight Simulator! üåç This addon by SoFly brings North Macedonia's charming and scenic airport to life with stunning detail and realism. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of Lake Ohrid and mountainous landscapes, this meticulously recreated airport captures the spirit and history of this unique location. Featuring hyper-realistic details for all structures, aprons, taxiways, and hangars, as well as dynamic snow build-up and interactive scenery technology, LWOH Ohrid Airport offers an immersive flying experience. Download now and elevate your flight simulation adventures! üöÄ
